column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Canyon guide says : " All clear , we 're almost to the other side . "
#Text=Aang says : " Katara , Sokka , will these people cooperate long enough to get out of the canyon ? "
#Text=Katara says : " I do n't think so , Aang , the Zhangs really wronged the Gan Jins .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah Katara , what are you talking about ?
#Text=Wei Jin did n't steal the orb , he was returning it to their village gate and was wrongfully punished by the Gan Jin .
#Text=" Katara says : " Not punished enough if you ask me .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , okay I get it !
#Text=Now I need your help , I need everyone together at the base of the canyon wall .
#Text=Please everyone , as soon as we get out of here we can eat and then go our separate ways , but I need you all to put your heads together and figure out a way up this cliff .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Maybe the Zhang can climb the wall with their long disgusting fingernails .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Oh sorry , I forgot that to the Gan Jin unclipped fingernails is a crime punishable by twenty years in jail !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Why , you dirty thief !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " You pompous fool !
#Text=" Aang says : " Guys , focus !
#Text=How many times do I have to say it ?
#Text=Harsh words wo n't solve problems , action will !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Perhaps the Avatar is right .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Yes , perhaps he is .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Harsh words will never solve our problems .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Action will !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " To the death !
#Text=And let this be the end of this rivalry !
#Text=" Aang says : " You know , I take it back .
#Text=Harsh words are n't so bad !
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that ... food ?
#Text=Everyone smuggled food down here ?
#Text=Unbelievable !
#Text=You guys put our lives in danger because you could n't go without a snack for a day ?
#Text=You 're all awful !
#Text=So hungry .
#Text=Is that an egg custard in that tart ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh no , that 's a lot of canyon crawlers .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We barely survived one !
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " They 're coming back for me !
#Text=They 've had a taste and they 're coming back for me !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , wait .
#Text=I do n't care about this stupid feud , I just want us to get out of here alive .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Me too .
#Text=I only took their side 'cause they fed me .
#Text=" Aang says : " Everybody , watch me and do what I do !
#Text=Now follow me !
#Text=We 're riding out of this hole !
#Text=Everyone , get off !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " We made it !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " I never thought a Gan Jin could get his hands dirty like that .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " And I never knew you Zhangs were so reliable in a pinch .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Perhaps we 're not so different after all .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Too bad we ca n't rewrite history .
#Text=You thieves stole our sacred orb from Jin Wei !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " You tyrants unjustly imprisoned Wei Jin for twenty long years !
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait a second ... Jin Wei ?
#Text=Wei Jin ?
#Text=I know those guys !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Yes , yes , we 're all aware of the story .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I mean I really knew them .
#Text=I might not look it , but I 'm a hundred and twelve years old .
#Text=I was there one hundred years ago on the day you 're talking about .
#Text=There seems to be a lot of confusion about what happened .
#Text=First of all , Jin Wei and Wei Jin were n't enemies .
#Text=They were brothers , twins in fact , and they were eight ; and most importantly , they were just playing a game !
#Text=The sacred orb from the legend , that was the ball !
#Text=And the eastern and western gates were the goal posts .
#Text=Jin Wei had the ball and was running toward the goal when he fell and fumbled it .
#Text=Wei Jin did n't steal the ball , he picked it up and started running it toward the other goal , but he stepped out of bounds , so the official put him in the penalty box .
#Text=Not for twenty long years but for two short minutes .
#Text=There was no stealing and no putting anyone in imprison , it was just a game .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " You 're saying the sacred orb was actually a sacred ball ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Nope , just a regular ball .
#Text=" Gan Jin man says : " What about our tribe 's redemption ritual ?
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's what the game was called , redemption .
#Text=As soon as you got the ball from one end to the other , everyone would yell " redemption " !
#Text=Do n't get me wrong , Wei Jin was kind of a slob and Jin Wei was a little stuffy , that much is true .
#Text=But they respected each other 's differences enough to share the same playing field .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " I suppose it 's time we forget the past .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " And look to the future .
#Text="
